post_message: The chairman of the Senate Judiciary Committee wants Attorney General Eric H. Holder Jr. to explain why a Department of Justice gun ban list has a defective category consisting almost entirely of names belonging to military veterans and their dependents. disturbing to think that the men and women who dedicated themselves to defending our freedom and values face undue threats to their fundamental Second Amendment rights from the very agency established to serve them, Sen. Chuck Grassley, Iowa Republican, said in a statement Wednesday.
